name: Minesweep World
description:
Minesweep World


Find the hidden bombs by opening cells that may or not contain a bomb. If there are bombs around you'll see the number of boms that are surrounding the current cell.

Features

Early access version has:
- Board configuration up to 60x60 boards.
- Easy, Standard, Difficult board autoconfig buttons.
- 6 different backgrounds.
- Complete loop to enjoy the game, you can fully play the core gameplay.

Comming soon

- Local Leaderboards.
- Bigger boards.
- 4 additional backgrounds.
- If community asks for interesting game modes or features I'll do my best to include too.
- Additional localisations.
